text: Go to level 3 of tower 3 - itâ€™s located to the right of two heng ktv. Practical layout for prayers but will to take ablution first.

Convenient. Everything is provided. Can perform ablution at toilet next to Burger King.

Thanx to Suntec Management for providing prayer facility.
This pryaing room is a very excellent idea of the mall. Thank you so much. There are sandals which can be borrowed to take wudlu water in the toilet of this floor.
Good place and initiative from management. Just it's open quite late(mall working hours) to ensure nobody sleep inside. Thus it's quite not suitable for dhuha.

Such a beautiful place to do my prayers. Ablution I did at the toilet next to Burger King but not a hassle and space and tranquility makes it worth it. Thank you to those who gave this space to us! ðŸ’•
